gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.eq.model.Distance

  • Packages that use Distance 
    Package Description
    gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.eq.fault.surface
    Fault surfaces.
    gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.eq.model
    Earthquake Source and HazardModel representations.
    gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.gmm
    Implementations of all GroundMotionModels used in the 2008 and 2014 USGS National Seismic Hazard Models.

    • Uses of Distance in gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.eq.fault.surface

      Methods in gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.eq.fault.surface that return Distance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Distance RuptureSurface.distanceTo(Location loc)
      Returns the distance metrics commonly required by PSHA ground motion models (GMMs): rJB, rRup, and rX.

    • Uses of Distance in gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.eq.model

      Methods in gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.eq.model that return Distance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Distance Distance.compute(GriddedSurface surface, Location loc)
      Compute distance metrics: rJB, rRup, and rX.

    • Uses of Distance in gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.gmm

      Methods in gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.gmm with parameters of type Distance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GmmInput.Builder GmmInput.Builder.distances(Distance distances)
      Set the Joyner-Boore distance, rupture distance, and distance X with a Distance object.
